title: Organic mass spectometry
creator_credit: Peter Griffiths, Michael Clarke, Associated Electrical Industries Film Unit and Viewpoint Productions
brief_description: The film shows the comparative ease and simplicity of operation of the MS9 and M12 mass spectrometers. It is intended for scientists, particularly organic chemists and bio-chemists.
creator_credit_for_label: Peter Griffiths, Michael Clarke, Associated Electrical Industries Film Unit and Viewpoint Productions
